pr_title: [HUDI-484] Fix NPE when reading IncrementalPull.sqltemplate in HiveIncrementalPuller

timeline.message: [HUDI-484] Fix NPE when reading IncrementalPull.sqltemplate in HiveIncrementalPuller

timeline.bodyText: rename to setup()? most of our tests are that way I think.
timeline.author: vinothchandar

timeline.bodyText: Not following this.. a constructor can either throw an exception or return a non-null object right? should we be using a try-catch and calling fail from the catch block to ensure the NPE is not thrown?
timeline.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: Got it, thank you for your guidance.
replies.author: lamberken

timeline.bodyText: nit: do we still need the throws Exception? :)
timeline.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: Good catch 👍 . Sorry, I forgot to delete it.
replies.author: lamberken
